meanings.definition: A small dish of food or a drink taken before a meal to stimulate one's appetite.
meanings.sent1: The appetisers at the party were tiny but delicious.
meanings.sent2: We ordered a variety of appetisers to share before our main course.
meanings.sent3: The appetisers were so good, I almost filled up before the main meal!
meanings.sent4: The appetisers were like little bites of happiness on a plate.
meanings.sent5: The appetisers were like a flavorful teaser for the feast to come.

meanings.definition: Something that arouses a desire or interest.
meanings.sent1: The mystery novel was an appetiser for my love of detective stories.
meanings.sent2: The movie trailer served as a great appetiser for the film itself.
meanings.sent3: The new video game was an appetiser for hours of entertainment.
meanings.sent4: The art exhibition was an appetiser for my creativity.
meanings.sent5: The enticing smell of fresh bread was an appetiser for my hunger.
